description:
Misha’s first Angel Exam is underway. Kotarou and friends go to cheer her on, but Misha ineffectively uses her angel powers and accidentally creates mayhem.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El esfuerzo de un ángel aprendiz
How an Apprentice Angel Tries Her Best
Manière de persévérer en tant qu’apprenti ange
見習い天使のがんばり方
